name: Bridge Construction Chaos
description:
You have a magical sky crane, and a construction job to do. But the traffic hasn't been stopped. You'll just have to work around them I guess. Don't worry if a few innocents end up in the water in the process. I'm almost entirely sure they can swim.

  • Controls are all on an XBox controller, and are shown in game.
  • Features 6 incredibly detailed challenging levels.
  • No winching the cars to the goal. Your mum didn't raise you to be a cheat!
  • Built by a team of one, in about a day and a half. For the GMTK Games Jam.

No need to complete levels if you don't want to. You can skip back and forth as much as you like.

I raided lots of my old Flash projects for sound effects. Graphics are a mix of unique assets built in ProBuilder during the jam, and a few free assets from the Asset Store. Mainly Broken Vector's low poly car pack. Although the code to make them run around was all written in the jam. I've also used RayFire, which is a paid plugin I own from a different project. I've probably missed some attribution stuff. It's hard enough to keep track when you're working on a full project, let alone in a rushed games jam.
